org.jerkar.api.tooling

Class JkMvn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.tooling.JkMvn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class JkMvn
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Convenioent class wrapping maven process.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean INSTALLED
      Returns true if Maven is installed on the machine running this code.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static final JkMvn of(java.io.File workingDir,
                             java.lang.String... args)
        Creates a Maven command. Separate argument in different string, don't use white space to separate workds. Ex : JkMvn.of(myFile, "clean", "install", "-U").

      • commands

        public final JkMvn commands(java.lang.String... args)
        return a new maven command for this working directory. Separate arguments in different strings, don't use white space to separate workds. Ex : withCommand("clean", "install", "-U").

      • fromMvnFlatFile

        public static JkDependencies fromMvnFlatFile(java.io.File flatFile)
        Creates a JkDependencies from a file describing definition like. 
         
 org.springframework:spring-aop:jar:4.2.3.BUILD-SNAPSHOT:compile
 org.yaml:snakeyaml:jar:1.16:runtime
 org.slf4j:log4j-over-slf4j:jar:1.7.12:compile
 org.springframework.boot:spring-boot:jar:1.3.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT:compile
 org.hamcrest:hamcrest-core:jar:1.3:test
 aopalliance:aopalliance:jar:1.0:compile
 org.springframework:spring-test:jar:4.2.3.BUILD-SNAPSHOT:test
 org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-autoconfigure:jar:1.3.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT:compile
 ch.qos.logback:logback-core:jar:1.1.3:compile
 org.hamcrest:hamcrest-library:jar:1.3:test
 junit:junit:jar:4.12:test
 org.slf4j:slf4j-api:jar:1.7.12:compile
        The following format are accepted for each line :
        • group:name:classifier:version:scope (classifier "jar" equals to no classifier)
        • group:name:version:scope (no classifier)
        • group:name:version (default version is scope)
